_meta.description: Top 100 SaaS tools for unsurf directory scouting
_meta.criteria: Developer demand x scout friendliness x API richness

difficulty_tiers.easy: Public-facing pages with discoverable API calls, minimal auth required
difficulty_tiers.medium: SPA with background API calls, may need navigation or free trial
difficulty_tiers.hard: Heavy auth walls, bot protection, or complex multi-page SPAs

sites.name: HubSpot
sites.description: All-in-one CRM with marketing, sales, and service hubs
sites.notes: Rich REST API, free tier available, CRM + marketing + sales endpoints

sites.name: Pipedrive
sites.description: Sales-focused CRM with pipeline management

sites.name: Close
sites.description: Inside sales CRM with built-in calling and email

sites.name: Freshsales
sites.description: Freshworks CRM for sales teams with AI scoring
sites.notes: Part of Freshworks suite, REST API with contact and deal management

sites.name: Copper
sites.description: Google Workspace-native CRM
sites.notes: Tight Google integration, REST API for contacts/leads/opportunities

sites.name: Attio
sites.description: Modern data-driven CRM with flexible data model
sites.notes: Clean modern SPA, REST API with customizable objects

sites.name: Insightly
sites.description: CRM with project management and workflow automation
sites.notes: REST API for contacts, organizations, projects, tasks

sites.name: Agile CRM
sites.description: All-in-one CRM for small businesses with marketing automation
sites.notes: REST API, free tier for up to 10 users

sites.name: Zoho CRM
sites.description: Feature-rich CRM with extensive customization
sites.notes: Complex OAuth, very broad API surface but heavy SPA

sites.name: Bitrix24
sites.description: All-in-one business suite with CRM, tasks, and communication
sites.notes: Heavy SPA with many modules, REST API available

sites.name: Linear
sites.description: Modern issue tracking with keyboard-first design
sites.notes: Clean GraphQL API, well-structured SPA, popular with dev teams

sites.name: Notion
sites.description: All-in-one workspace for docs, wikis, and project management
sites.notes: REST API for pages/databases/blocks, massive user base

sites.name: Asana
sites.description: Work management platform for teams
sites.notes: REST API for tasks, projects, workspaces, portfolios

sites.name: ClickUp
sites.description: All-in-one productivity and project management platform

sites.name: Monday.com
sites.description: Work OS for teams with customizable workflows

sites.name: Height
sites.description: Autonomous project management with AI features
sites.notes: Clean modern SPA, REST API for tasks and lists

sites.name: Basecamp
sites.description: Project management and team communication platform

sites.name: Wrike
sites.description: Collaborative work management platform

sites.name: Teamwork
sites.description: Project management for client work and agencies

sites.name: Jira
sites.description: Enterprise issue and project tracking by Atlassian
sites.notes: Complex SPA, REST + GraphQL APIs, heavy auth flow

sites.name: Twilio
sites.description: Cloud communications platform for SMS, voice, and video
sites.notes: API-first platform, extensive REST API documentation

sites.name: Resend
sites.description: Modern email API built for developers
sites.notes: Clean REST API, simple auth, React Email integration

sites.name: Postmark
sites.description: Transactional email service with high deliverability

sites.name: SendGrid
sites.description: Email delivery and marketing platform by Twilio

sites.name: Mailchimp
sites.description: Email marketing and audience management platform

sites.name: Intercom
sites.description: Customer messaging platform with bots and live chat

sites.name: Crisp
sites.description: Business messaging platform with live chat and chatbots

sites.name: Zendesk
sites.description: Customer service and engagement platform

sites.name: Slack
sites.description: Team messaging and collaboration platform
sites.notes: Complex SPA, rich Web API but heavy auth requirements

sites.name: Discord
sites.description: Community platform for messaging, voice, and video
sites.notes: Bot protection, REST API for guilds/channels/messages

sites.name: PostHog
sites.description: Open-source product analytics with session replay and feature flags

sites.name: Plausible
sites.description: Privacy-focused lightweight web analytics
sites.notes: Simple API, stats/breakdown endpoints, no cookies

sites.name: Mixpanel
sites.description: Product analytics for tracking user behavior and funnels

sites.name: Amplitude
sites.description: Digital analytics platform for product and growth teams

sites.name: Fathom
sites.description: Simple privacy-first website analytics

sites.name: Heap
sites.description: Digital insights platform with auto-capture analytics

sites.name: Segment
sites.description: Customer data platform for collecting and routing analytics

sites.name: Hotjar
sites.description: Heatmaps, session recordings, and user feedback tools
sites.notes: SPA dashboard, REST API for sites/heatmaps/recordings

sites.name: FullStory
sites.description: Digital experience intelligence with session replay

sites.name: Datadog
sites.description: Infrastructure monitoring and APM platform

sites.name: Supabase
sites.description: Open-source Firebase alternative with Postgres, auth, and storage
sites.notes: REST + GraphQL APIs, clean dashboard SPA, very popular with developers

sites.name: Vercel
sites.description: Frontend deployment and serverless functions platform

sites.name: Neon
sites.description: Serverless Postgres with branching and auto-scaling

sites.name: Upstash
sites.description: Serverless Redis and Kafka for modern applications
sites.notes: REST API for database management, clean dashboard

sites.name: Railway
sites.description: Infrastructure platform for deploying apps and databases

sites.name: Netlify
sites.description: Web hosting and automation platform for modern web projects

sites.name: Render
sites.description: Cloud platform for hosting web services and databases

sites.name: Fly.io
sites.description: Global application deployment platform with edge computing

sites.name: Deno Deploy

sites.description: E-commerce email marketing and automation platform

sites.name: ActiveCampaign
sites.description: Marketing automation and CRM platform

sites.name: Unbounce

sites.name: Hootsuite
sites.description: Social media management and scheduling platform

sites.name: Ahrefs
sites.description: SEO toolset for backlinks, keywords, and site audits

sites.name: SEMrush
